name: teak

the wood of a type of large tropical tree: The carriage is finished in varnished teak. teak furniture

a type of large tropical tree: They were planting teak and mahogany and some fruit trees. a teak forest
/GettyImages
More examplesFewer examplesThe woods used were polished teak and light oak. Her furniture is made using reclaimed teak.Most teak is now harvested in ecologically friendly ways.The National Park is surrounded by moist deciduous forest and teak plantations.
